titleStmt.title: A casket of ievvells and precious pearles Set forth in a funerall sermon, preached in Heckfield Church, at the buriall of a religious young gentleman, Mr. Barnabas Creswell, sonne of Mr. Thomas Creswell Esquire, by Nathanael Cannon, Batchelar in diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Cannon, Nathanael, 1581 or 2-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathanael Newbery, at the Starre vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
